Articles.Content:
Hello and welcome

I have recently learned to edit ksp code. I am planning to create a 'mod' that will be nerf/revoked certain parts. I plan finish sometime this month. Anyone with suggestions for me (Such as parts you'd want me to edit) please reply and tell me what part you want me to fix and exactly WHAT you want me to do. (Like adding more thrust or reducing wind resistance)

So please feel free to reply and make any suggestions

Please stop polluting the forums with this rubbish.

One thread for editing stock part configs is already one to many. Two about that topic is just trolling....
harsh. that could have been worded in a more constructive way.

Please stop polluting the forums with this rubbish.

One thread for editing stock part configs is already one to many. Two about that topic is just trolling....

Or we could just assume an honest mistake (not noticing the edit button, for instance), rather than jumping straight to hostilities. Sure, the topic may not be the most pleasant for you, but that doesn't warrant accusing a new user of trolling over that, so stay nice to each other, folks.

I'm closing this thread now.

FEichinger
